title: Oxfordshire Live: Friday 28 October - BBC News
summary: weather today : dry with variable amounts of cloud .
humpty hill meadow retained as village green by high court decision .
oxford united inconsistency is a 'topic of conversation among the squad ' .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for reading .
we 'll be back with more news , sport , travel and weather from around oxfordshire from 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: man jailed for trying to kill mother
text: a man who stabbed his elderly mother in the neck is jailed for 18 years for attempted murder .

documents.title: mother who was stabbed by son praised for bravery
text: det insp larry johnson said : `` i would like to commend the victim for a bravery throughout this process .
`` i hope that the lengthy sentence given to [ steven ] williams helps in some way to help her and her family move on from this incident . ''
daphne williams called 999 and reported that her son had stabbed her , after which she was treated at the john radcliffe hospital .
her son has now been made subject to an indefinite restraining order , preventing him from contacting his mother .

documents.title: last day to have a say over east oxford community centre
text: today is the last day to have your say on the future of east oxford community centre .
take part in the consultation :

documents.title: travel update : heavy traffic reported in city centre
text: heavy traffic reported in oxford city centre from st giles to beaumont street , and hythe bridge street to worcester street .
there are also bus delays being reported across the city .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: introducing in oxford interviews glass animals
text: dave gilyeat interviewed dave bayley from glass animals this week .
he dropped by the bbc oxford studios ahead of the band 's hometown gig at o2 academy oxford .
he spoke about writing the new album `` how to be a human being '' and meeting superfans in the us .

documents.title: breakingman who tried to kill mother jailed for 18 years
text: a man has been jailed for 18 years for attempting to murder his 72-year-old mother in her oxfordshire home .
steven williams , 44 , of hailey road , chipping norton , stabbed daphne williams in the neck on 24 april .
he was found guilty of attempted murder by a majority verdict after a seven-day trial at oxford crown court .
det insp larry johnson said williams subjected his mother to `` a serious , unprovoked attack , which very nearly killed her '' .

documents.title: fears over future of covered market after fresh rent rises
text: a fresh battle over rents at oxford 's historic covered market is looming after traders were told they face hikes of up to 25 per cent .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: tower 'apartment ' built to house ospreys
text: thames water has built a 10m-high osprey tower at pinkhill nature reserve near farmoor reservoir in the hope of attracting the rare birds .
reserve warden hanna jenkins said : our hope is that the nest at the top of the tower will be spotted by a young male osprey on his way back from spending the winter in west africa .
they 're notoriously lazy and prefer a ready-made home rather than one they have to build themselves .
if one makes its territory at pinkhill it might attract a mate the following season so by 2018 we might have our first breeding pair . ''
once extinct in the wild in the uk , osprey numbers gradually recovered in scotland in the mid-20th century and by the early 1990s there were more than 70 breeding pairs .

documents.title: pumpkin hunting with bbc oxford 's ali jones
text: it would n't be halloween without a pumpkin hunt .
i 'd like to pretend this is my garden .
in fact it 's fab @ twitterid
thank you pleased you enjoyed the pumpkin hunt and our lovely garden

text: due to `` operational reasons '' the following oxford city bus services are not operating :

documents.title: latest movies reviewed , including doctor strange
text: james luxford from the radio times has joined david prever in the studio to discuss the latest movie releases .
james reviewed the latest marvel superhero movie dr strange , and met its director scott derrickson .
he also recommended the light between oceans starring alicia vikander and michael fassbender .

documents.title: travel update : heavy northbound around hinksey hill
text: there 's heavy traffic on the a34 northbound in oxford around hinksey hill .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: a first for care home ratings in oxfordshire
text: cleeve lodge care home in goring-on-thames has been found to be `` outstanding '' following an inspection last month .
the care quality commission ( cqc ) said it was responsive to people 's needs , and good at being safe , effective and caring .

deborah ivanova , the cqc 's deputy chief inspector of adult social care , said : cleeve lodge was exceptionally well-led , and this was clearly demonstrated through their passion for providing care that valued and treated people as individuals and enabled them to live full and active lives . ''
earlier this year vale house in sandford , and the grange in stanford in the vale , were also rated outstanding , marking the first time three sites have received the rating in oxfordshire .
judith heathcoat , oxfordshire county council 's cabinet member for adult social care , said : `` i hope this is the start of many more to come . ''

documents.title: charles nove is a pumpkinhead
text: lilley mitchell went to waddesdon manor this morning to get top tips for carving the perfect pumpkin .
we are very impressed with her de of the oxford skyline on this one .
even more uncanny is this effort from the team there .
charles nove is the one on the right .

documents.title: travel update : queues on m40 northbound
text: there 's queuing traffic on the m40 northbound before junction 7 , a40 ( thame ) , because of an earlier broken down vehicle .
the congestion goes back to junction 6 , b4009 ( watlington ) .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fire service warning over halloween costumes
text: oxfordshire county council 's fire & rescue service and trading standards team has urged people buying halloween costumes to check they comply with fire safety regulations .

jody kerman , trading standards operation manager , said : `` we do n't want to stop people enjoying halloween , but we do want them to celebrate safely and be aware of ways to reduce the fire risks .
before buying a children 's fancy dress costume , check that it includes the ce mark . ''

strictly come dancing presenter claudia winkleman has previously spoken to the bbc 's watchdog programme about how her daughter 's costume went up in flames , highlighting a legal flaw which classes fancy dress costumes as toys , rather than clothes .

documents.title: 'poshstock ' will go out with a bang , says cornbury founder
text: as tickets go on sale for the last ever cornbury festival , event founder hugh phillimore tells tim hughes why it 's time to say farewell .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: david cameron presented with lgtb award
text: former prime minister david cameron has been presented with the newspaper pinknews ' `` ally of the year '' award in recognition of his work securing equal marriage .
mr cameron , who left office following the eu referendum earlier this year , was honoured in recognition of his work to transform both the conservative party and the country on lgbt rights .
the ex-leader stood down as an mp for witney following his departure from office , and has cited securing equal marriage as one of his proudest achievements in government .

documents.title: objections were raised against marina extension
text: claydon with clattercote parish council opposed the proposals to extend cropredy marina , saying it would `` pose additional pressure on local services [ and ] the problems of light and permanent residency will only increase '' .
cropredy parish council also raised concerns about light pollution and people using it for unauthorised residential use , though did not object .

however , the district council decided it would provide economic benefit and `` subject to a condition controlling the detail of any external lighting , the proposal would not cause undue harm to the residential amenity of neighbouring occupiers '' .
those found to be living permanently at the site will be required to leave , it said .

documents.title: cropredy marina expansion approved
text: plans to expand a marina in north oxfordshire have been approved .
cropredy marina opened three years ago and has a waiting list for the 250 mooring spaces currently provided on site .
the new development was approved by cherwell district council and will include 100 extra moorings , a new car park , and swing bridge .

documents.title: oxford united 'must sort out inconsistency '
text: oxford united midfielder liam sercombe admits the team 's inconsistency is a topic of conversation among the squad .
they 're exactly four points off both the league one play-off positions and the relegation zone heading into tomorrow 's game against millwall .
united ended bradford city 's unbeaten record in their last home match but were 3-0 down at half time in losing to afc wimbledon in the other home game before it .
we always talk as a team that we 've been very inconsistent this year .
we just need to sort that out .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel update : heavy traffic in benson
text: there 's heavy traffic on the a4074 in both directions in benson around the elm bridge roundabout in the roadworks area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : 'dry and mild '
text: a dry day with variable amounts of cloud .
there 'll be light winds and some sunny spells at times .
it 'll feel mild for late october , with maximum temperatures of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: village green status of faringdon 's humpty hill upheld
text: a decision to register a meadow as a village green where people can `` hang out '' and `` chill '' has been upheld by the high court .
residents have campaigned for four years to preserve the 14-acre site at humpty hill , faringdon , oxfordshire , following a proposed 100-home development .
the county council registered the land as a village green in december .
mrs justice patterson has now dismissed a challenge to that decision .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC News

documents.title: travel update : heavy traffic on a40 north way
text: there 's heavy traffic on the a40 north way in oxford before the cutteslowe roundabout .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning
text: hello and welcome to bbc local live for oxfordshire on friday .
we 'll be bringing you the latest headlines across the day as they happen .
you can be part of the conversation via email , facebook and twitter .
